[size=150][color=gray]What is Media Composer?[/color][/size]
Media Composer is the most proven video editing software in the industry, trusted by professional editors in every segment of movie making, television, broadcast, and streaming media. Designed to handle high volumes of disparate file-based media, Media Composer delivers accelerated high-res and HD workflows, real-time collaboration, and powerful media management, eliminating time-consuming tasks so you can focus on telling a great story. [color=gray][size=150]Changes:[/size][/color]

[*] [b]Version 8.3:[/b] Brings us 2K, 4K and UHD support, New Frame Rates, Color Management, LUT Enhancements, Proxy Mode, DPX Export, Quick Filter Bin, List Tool, Color Info Tool and much moreÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

[*] [b]Version 8.1:[/b] Brings us AAX-64, Exporting MXF OP1a, Frame View Border Colors and Icons, Filter out AMA Media, Placing titles in timelines, Changes to dragging in the UI, Support for ARRI AMIRA Camera, Muting Individual Clips, Disabling a video track, multiple audio mixdowns, group clip support for steroscopic clips, setting for selecting filler, extending shift trim, end of trim indicators, and much more!
